description: This file defines the MarkdownReader class, a specialized reader for Markdown files that supports synchronous and asynchronous reading, chunking, and logging functionalities within a larger document processing system.

classes.name: MarkdownReader
classes.description: A class for reading Markdown files, supporting both sync and async operations, with chunking capabilities.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes a MarkdownReader with an optional chunking strategy.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads a Markdown file synchronously, returning a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads a Markdown file, returning a list of Document objects.

methods.name: _async_chunk_document
methods.description: Handles asynchronous chunking of a Document.
